RawLine: SDM_1104007308,小女鬼的症狀是…有了，{color=#FF0000}全身發紫，身體轉冷{/color}，應該使用寒熱篇的藥來治療。,小女鬼的症状是…有了，{color=#FF0000}全身发紫，身体转冷{/color}，应该使用寒热篇的药来治疗。

Items.mt: The little girl's symptoms are... There, the whole body is purple, the body has turned cold, and should be treated with the cold and hot remedies.
